trans-unit.source: PowerShell Script Discovery, Install and Management with PowerShellGet
trans-unit.target: 使用 PowerShellGet 进行 PowerShell 脚本发现、安装和管理

trans-unit.source: PowerShell Script sharing feature got added to the PowerShellGet in the WMF 5.0 RTM release.
trans-unit.target: 在 WMF 5.0 RTM 版本中已将 PowerShell 脚本共享功能添加到了 PowerShellGet。

trans-unit.source: The following new cmdlets are added to the PowerShellGet module for supporting the PowerShell Scripts.
trans-unit.target: 以下新的 cmdlet 将被添加到 PowerShellGet 模块以支持 PowerShell 脚本。
脚本共享 Cmdlet 的语法：
